Html:
I installed KiGG and runs as expected. Great! But I do have (a newbie) question. Is there some kind of admin page/module in KiGG where I can for example manage users that are registered?

thanks.

When you connect as Admin, you have access to a small panel for managing stories
You can easly customize this one.
Thanks nachid, I have seen the admin panel but this is very limited. Did anyone make extensions to this panel?
